history.proof: intros m z t H1 H2. unfold Iter_upb. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z, t : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : expo m z t Unable to unify "(ndN m - card (Iter_rem m t))%nat" with "(ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z))%nat".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m t

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
dart = nat : Set
expo_symm : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> expo m t z
expo_trans : forall (m : fmap) (z t u : dart), expo m z t -> expo m t u -> expo m z u
expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> exd m t
expo_expo1 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t < -> expo1 m z t
expo1_ex_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in ex_j m z t (p - 1) < -> expo1 m z t
ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
expo_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> {expo m z t} + {~ expo m z t}
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
expo1_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> {expo1 m z t} + {~ expo1 m z t}
L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m (Iter (f m) i z)
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
expo1 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (let p := Iter_upb m z in exists j : nat, (j < p)%nat /\ Iter (f m) j z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) nr z = z
P4 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t} : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Set
upb_pos : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> (0 < Iter_upb m z)%nat
expo_refl : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> expo m z z
ex_j = fix ex_j (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0%nat => z = t | S n0 => Iter (f m) n z = t \/ ex_j m z t n0 end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
ex_j_exist_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat), ex_j m z t n < -> (exists j : nat, (j <= n)%nat /\ Iter (f m) j z = t)
ex_i_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) nr z}
Iter_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i n : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (f m) i z
unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (f m) j z = Iter (f m) k z -> j = k
mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) j z /\ (j < p)%nat}
exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> exds s (Iter (f m) i z)
f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
M.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f m (M.f_1 m z) = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
not_pred_B_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ pred m k z -> B_1 m k z = m
not_succ_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k z -> B m k z = m
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> diff_orb m z
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, z > 0 -> t > 0 -> 0 <= x -> 0 <= y -> 0 <= x * z + y * t
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
